name: Zenith 57 Stationary Table
descr:
57-Zenith Stationary Table

ountoured to fit your patients and your treatment needs. A proven performer year after year. Outstanding 3 drop stationary table; bulit to last. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Swingaway Abdominal- Adjustable Tension 
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Drop Pelvic w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Terminal Point Drop Dorsal w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Chrome Base Finish 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Table Length 62” 
Table Height 20”, 22”, 24”, or 26” 
Table Width 24” 
Cushion Width 18” 
Table Weight 175 lbs. depending on options
